pin.setup_step1_desc: Choose a 6-digit PIN to secure your sensitive actions.
pin.verify_old_desc: Please enter your current PIN to authenticate.
pin.confirm_new_desc: Re-enter your new PIN to confirm.
pin.common_pattern: Sequences or repetitions are not allowed (e.g. 123456, AAAAAA)
pin.alphanumeric_tip: You can use letters and numbers
pin.usage_explanation: This security PIN acts as a second layer of authentication for high-security actions, including withdrawals, password resets, and legal document updates.

landing.hero_title: Professional Tax & Immigration Services You Can Trust
landing.hero_subtitle: Expert guidance for your tax returns, business formation, and immigration paperwork. Fast, secure, and reliable service.
landing.why_choose_subtitle: We combine professional expertise with modern technology to deliver the best results.
landing.refund_guarantee_text: We carefully review every deduction and credit to ensure you get the maximum refund possible.
landing.audit_protection_text: Rest easy knowing that our certified enrolled agents represent you in case of any IRS inquiries.
landing.certified_experts_text: All returns are prepared and reviewed by certified tax professionals and immigration specialists.
landing.step1_desc: Take photos of your W-2s and other forms using our secure mobile app.
landing.step2_desc: Our professionals prepare your return and contact you for any missing details.
landing.step3_desc: Review your return, sign electronically, and we file it instantly with the IRS.
landing.tax_prep_desc: Personal and business tax returns filed accurately and on time.
landing.immigration_desc: Assistance with citizenship, green cards, and work permits.
landing.consulting_desc: Strategic advice for your growing business and financial future.
landing.ready_to_start_subtitle: Join the satisfied clients who trust TrustTax with their financial future.

services.title: Professional Services
services.subtitle: Choose from our range of expert financial and legal services designed to help you succeed.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.process_time_q: How long does the process take?
faq.process_time_a: Typically 2-4 business days from submission of all required documents.
faq.changes_q: What if I need to make changes?
faq.changes_a: You can request revisions at any time during the review process.
faq.security_a: Yes, we use bank-level encryption and comply with all privacy regulations.
faq.guarantees_a: Yes, we provide accuracy guarantees and will support any IRS correspondence.

process.step2_desc: Upload required documents through our encrypted portal.
process.step3_desc: Our certified professionals review your submission.
process.step4_desc: Double verification ensures accuracy and compliance.
process.step5_desc: Receive your completed service with ongoing support.

dashboard.subtitle: Your professional tax workspace

dashboard.profile_incomplete_message: Your profile is incomplete. Complete it to access all services and ensure accurate tax preparation.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account information and preferences
profile.name: Name
profile.incomplete_warning: Your profile is incomplete. Please complete all required fields.
profile.encryption_note: All sensitive information is encrypted using AES-256-GCM encryption before storage.
profile.accept_terms: I accept the Terms and Conditions
profile.terms_note: By accepting, you acknowledge that your Social Security Number and other sensitive data will be encrypted and protected according to our security standards.
profile.required_fields: First name and last name are required
profile.ssn_required: Valid SSN or ITIN (XXX-XX-XXXX) is required
profile.why_ssn_title: Why we ask for SSN or ITIN
profile.why_ssn_body: We use your Social Security Number (SSN) or Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) solely for preparing and filing your tax returns with the IRS. This information is required by law for U.S. tax compliance. We encrypt it using AES-256-GCM before storage and never share it with third parties except as required for filing.
profile.why_dl_title: Why we ask for driver's license
profile.why_dl_body: We use your driver's license details (number, state of issue, expiration) to verify your identity for tax preparation and to comply with IRS due diligence requirements. All data is encrypted with AES-256-GCM before storage. We never display the full number.
profile.why_passport_body: We use your passport number, country of issue, and expiration date for identity verification in immigration-related tax services and IRS compliance. All data is encrypted with AES-256-GCM before storage. We never display the full passport number.
profile.why_section_intro: We collect personal and sensitive information solely to provide accurate tax preparation, e-filing, and immigration-related services. Each field has a specific purpose:
profile.why_name: Full name (First, Middle, Last): Required by the IRS on tax forms and for identity verification.
profile.why_dob: Date of birth: Used for IRS forms and to prevent identity mix-ups.
profile.why_country_lang: Country of birth & primary language: Helps us tailor your experience and meet certain form requirements.
profile.why_ssn_itin: SSN or ITIN: Required by law for U.S. tax filing. Stored encrypted (AES-256-GCM). Only last 4 digits are shown for verification.
profile.why_dl: Driver's license: Used for identity verification and IRS due diligence. Encrypted at rest.
profile.why_passport: Passport: Used for immigration-related tax services and identity verification. Encrypted at rest.
profile.why_closing: By accepting our terms, you agree that this data will be encrypted, stored securely, and used only for the purposes described. We do not sell or share your information.
profile.terms_required: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue
profile.update_success_detail: Your profile has been saved successfully. Personal information, SSN/ITIN, terms acceptance, and any driver's license or passport data you provided have been updated and stored securely.
profile.save_disabled_terms: Accept the Terms and Conditions to save.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.data_protection_text: Your sensitive personal information, including Social Security Number (SSN), driver's license number, and passport number, is protected using industry-standard AES-256-GCM encryption. This means your data is encrypted before being stored in our secure database and can only be decrypted by authorized personnel when necessary for tax preparation services.
terms.security_measures_text: We implement multiple layers of security to protect your information: encryption at rest, secure transmission (HTTPS), access controls, and regular security audits. Your SSN is never displayed in full - only the last 4 digits are shown for verification purposes.
terms.data_usage_text: Your personal information is used solely for the purpose of providing tax preparation and immigration services. We do not sell, rent, or share your information with third parties except as required by law or with your explicit consent.
terms.your_rights_text: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You can request a copy of your data or withdraw your consent by contacting our support team.
terms.important_note: By accepting these terms, you acknowledge that you have read and understood our data protection practices and consent to the secure storage and processing of your sensitive information for tax preparation purposes.

dialog.logout_message: Are you sure you want to log out?

footer.brand_desc: Your professional partner for tax preparation, immigration services, and business consulting in Virginia.

w2_upload.title: Upload your W-2(s)
w2_upload.description: Upload your W-2 form(s) from all employers. We'll use them to prepare your return. You can add more than one if needed.
w2_upload.has_more: I had more than one W-2 this year
w2_upload.hint: Click "Upload W-2" to add your form. We accept PDF or clear photos. If you have multiple employers, you'll add each W-2 separately.
w2_upload.security_msg: Your documents are encrypted with AES-256 before saving. AI processing is private, SOC2 compliant, and your data is never used to train external models.
w2_upload.error_upload_msg: We couldn't upload your file safely. Please try again.
w2_upload.error_ai_msg: The AI could not process this document automatically at this time.

w2_summary.title: W-2 Summary
w2_summary.description: Review the information extracted from your form. If everything matches your physical document, you can continue. If you notice any errors, select 'Edit Data' to correct it manually.

w2_verify.title: Granular Verification
w2_verify.employee_ssn: Your SSN or ITIN (Box a) - Required for filing
w2_verify.employee_ssn_confirm: Confirm SSN or ITIN - Must match exactly
w2_verify.ssn_required_hint: Please enter your full SSN as we couldn't securely detect it.
w2_verify.ssn_mismatch: Social Security numbers do not match.
w2_verify.ssn_incomplete_msg: Please enter your full SSN (9 digits) to continue.
w2_verify.ein_incomplete_msg: Employer EIN is required and must be 9 digits.

w2_confirm.title: Confirm what we detected from your W-2
w2_confirm.description: Review the information we detected from your W-2. If everything is correct, check the box. If you need to correct something, write a note.
w2_confirm.correction_hint: We'll use this when preparing your return. You won't be asked to re-enter SSN or wages from the W-2.
w2_confirm.no_data: No structured data extracted yet. We'll use your upload as-is.
w2_confirm.complete_first: Please complete the W-2 upload step first.

filing_status.title: Filing Status & Dependents
filing_status.description: This defines much of your return even when your W-2 is complete. Answer as of December 31 of the tax year.
filing_status.filing_with_spouse: Will you file with your spouse?
filing_status.head_of_household: Do you want to file as Head of Household (HoH)?
filing_status.paid_over_50: I paid more than 50% of household costs
filing_status.claimable_as_dependent: Can someone claim you as a dependent?
filing_status.dependent_hint: Add each dependent (child, stepchild, etc.). SSN/ITIN is required for most benefits; if you don't have it yet, check "I don't have it" and we'll flag Needs Info.
filing_status.dependent_no_ssn: I don't have it yet (Needs Info)

other_income.title: Other Income
other_income.description: Besides your W-2, did you have any of the following? Mark yes for each that applies. If you say yes, we'll ask for the document or minimum amounts—don't skip these; they're where mistakes happen.
other_income.note_placeholder: Optional: notes, amounts, or document reference
other_income.summary: {{count}} other income source(s) selected. We'll include these in your return and may ask for uploads in the next step.

deductions.title: Deductions & Credits
deductions.description: The W-2 doesn't tell us much about these. If any apply, we'll ask for the form or amounts. If not, we won't bother you.
deductions.footer: We'll use your answers to prepare your return and may request specific forms (e.g. 1098) in the next step.

missing_docs.title: Documents we need (based on your answers)
missing_docs.description: You said yes to the following. Please upload each form or enter minimum amounts. If you don't have something yet, you can still submit—we'll mark your case as "Needs Info" and follow up.
missing_docs.no_missing_desc: Based on your answers, we don't need any extra forms beyond your W-2. You're good to go to the review step.
missing_docs.needs_info_note: Don't have something yet? Submit anyway. We'll mark your case as "Needs Info" and ask you for it later—no need to block your order.

review.title: Review & Submit
review.description: Please review the information below. By submitting, you confirm it's accurate to the best of your knowledge.
review.other_income_summary: {{otherCount}} other income source(s), {{dedCount}} deduction(s) / credit(s) selected.
review.documents_secure_msg: Your sensitive documents are encrypted and only accessible by authorized professionals.
review.terms_text: I agree to the Terms of Service. I confirm the information provided is accurate. A TrustTax professional will review my data and may contact me for any missing items (Needs Info).

form.upload_not_supported: Upload / signature not yet supported for this field.

bank.title: Direct Deposit
bank.description: Get your refund faster by setting up direct deposit. If you owe money, you can also use this for payment.
bank.warning: Please verify numbers carefully. TrustTax is not responsible for errors in provided bank information.

spouse.title: Spouse Information
spouse.description: Since you are filing jointly, we need your spouse's legal information.

address.title: Postal Address
address.description: We need your current address for official IRS notifications.

wizard.success_message: Your request has been securely received. A specialized agent will review your information and contact you shortly.
wizard.review_description: Please review your information before final submission.
wizard.secure_note: Your data is protected with 256-bit end-to-end encryption.
wizard.policy_text: By submitting this order, you agree to our Terms of Service. A TrustTax professional will review your data and create an invoice for the initial deposit.
wizard.documents_description: Please upload the following documents to proceed with your application. All files are securely encrypted.
wizard.doc_already_added: This document has already been added.
wizard.upload_error: Failed to upload document. Please try again.
wizard.delete_error: Could not delete document. Please try again.
wizard.file_too_large: The file is too large. Please upload one smaller than 10MB.

TrustTax uses high-priority AES-256-GCM encryption for all PII. By proceeding, you authorize the secure storage of your identification documents.
step4.agreement_body_2:
2. IRS COMPLIANCE
You certify that all information provided—including identity, birth, and origin records—is accurate and truthful.
step4.agreement_body_3:

By activating your profile, you agree to conduct transactions electronically and acknowledge that your digital acceptance carries full legal weight.
step4.accept_label: I ACCEPT THE PRIVACY PROTOCOLS AND SECURE ACTIVATION.

step3_verification.title: Document Verification
step3_verification.encryption_hint: Your document will be encrypted with AES-256 before storage.

sms_consent.title: SMS Consent Policy
sms_consent.description: Learn about our SMS messaging consent policy and how we use text messages to communicate with you.
sms_consent.intro: By providing your mobile phone number to {{companyName}} and opting in to receive SMS (text message) communications, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this SMS Consent Policy.
sms_consent.what_we_send_text: {{companyName}} may send you SMS messages for the following purposes:
sms_consent.purpose_3: Important tax filing deadlines and reminders
sms_consent.purpose_5: Security alerts (e.g., login attempts, password changes)
sms_consent.purpose_7: Promotional messages (only if you opt-in separately)
sms_consent.frequency_text: Message frequency varies based on your account activity and the services you use. You may receive messages as needed for service-related communications. Promotional messages, if opted in, are sent no more than 4 times per month.
sms_consent.opt_in_text: You can opt-in to receive SMS messages by:
sms_consent.opt_in_1: Providing your mobile phone number during account registration or profile setup
sms_consent.opt_in_2: Checking the SMS consent checkbox in your account settings
sms_consent.opt_in_3: Replying 'YES' or 'START' to a promotional SMS message
sms_consent.opt_in_4: Visiting our SMS consent page and completing the opt-in form
sms_consent.opt_out_text: You can opt-out of receiving SMS messages at any time by:
sms_consent.opt_out_1: Replying 'STOP', 'END', 'CANCEL', 'UNSUBSCRIBE', or 'QUIT' to any SMS message from us
sms_consent.opt_out_2: Unchecking the SMS consent option in your account settings
sms_consent.opt_out_3: Contacting our customer support team at {{phone}}
sms_consent.opt_out_warning: Note: After opting out, you will no longer receive SMS messages from us. However, you may still receive important account-related messages via email. Opting out of SMS does not affect your ability to use our services.
sms_consent.rates: Message and Data Rates May Apply
sms_consent.rates_text: Standard message and data rates may apply to SMS messages sent and received, as determined by your mobile carrier. We are not responsible for any charges incurred as a result of receiving SMS messages from us.
sms_consent.carriers_text: SMS messages are supported by major U.S. carriers including, but not limited to:
sms_consent.carriers_note: Carrier support may vary, and we cannot guarantee SMS delivery to all carriers or phone numbers.
sms_consent.privacy_text: Your mobile phone number and SMS preferences are protected in accordance with our Privacy Policy. We do not sell, rent, or share your phone number with third parties for their marketing purposes. SMS messages are sent through secure, encrypted channels.
sms_consent.help_text: If you need assistance with SMS messages or have questions about this policy, please contact us:
sms_consent.changes_text: We reserve the right to modify this SMS Consent Policy at any time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of SMS services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
sms_consent.acknowledgment: By opting in to receive SMS messages from {{companyName}}, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to this SMS Consent Policy. You understand that you can opt-out at any time and that message and data rates may apply.

sms_test.title: SMS Consent Test | {{companyName}}
sms_test.description: Test and verify your SMS consent status.
sms_test.subtitle: Verify your SMS consent status and opt-in to receive text messages
sms_test.info_text: By opting in to SMS messages, you consent to receive important updates, reminders, and notifications via text message. You can opt-out at any time by replying STOP to any message.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | {{companyName}}
privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.intro: {{companyName}} ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our tax preparation, immigration services, and related services (collectively, the "Services").
privacy.intro_2: Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. By using our Services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy.collect_intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, information collected automatically, and information from third parties:
privacy.personal_7: Bank account and routing numbers for refunds
privacy.automatic_3: Pages visited and time spent on pages
privacy.use_intro: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.use_1: Provide, maintain, and improve our Services
privacy.use_2: Prepare and file your tax returns
privacy.use_4: Communicate with you about your account and services
privacy.use_5: Send you important updates, reminders, and notifications
privacy.use_6: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
privacy.use_7: Detect, prevent, and address technical issues and fraud
privacy.use_8: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms
privacy.protection_text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:
privacy.protection_1: AES-256-GCM encryption for sensitive data at rest
privacy.protection_2: HTTPS/TLS encryption for data in transit
privacy.protection_4: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
privacy.protection_6: Employee training on data protection practices
privacy.protection_note: While we strive to protect your personal information, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but are committed to maintaining the highest standards of data protection.
privacy.sharing_intro: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
privacy.sharing_1: With the IRS and other tax authorities as required for tax filing
privacy.sharing_2: With service providers who assist us in operating our Services (under strict confidentiality agreements)
privacy.sharing_3: When required by law, court order, or government regulation
privacy.sharing_4: To protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users
privacy.sharing_5: In connection with a business transfer (merger, acquisition, etc.)
privacy.rights_intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
privacy.rights_1: Access: Request a copy of your personal information
privacy.rights_2: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
privacy.rights_3: Deletion: Request deletion of your account and data (subject to legal retention requirements)
privacy.rights_5: Data Portability: Request your data in a portable format
privacy.rights_contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at {{email}} or {{phone}}.
privacy.cookies_text: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and assist with marketing efforts. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling cookies may limit some functionality of our Services.
privacy.children_text: Our Services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.
privacy.changes_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
privacy.contact_text: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service | {{companyName}}
terms.description: Read our terms of service and understand your rights and obligations when using our services.
terms.intro: Welcome to {{companyName}}. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our tax preparation, immigration services, and related services (collectively, the "Services"). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms.intro_2: If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Services.
terms.acceptance_text: By creating an account, accessing our website, or using any of our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and {{companyName}}.
terms.eligibility_text: You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into contracts to use our Services. By using our Services, you represent and warrant that:
terms.eligibility_1: You are at least 18 years of age
terms.eligibility_2: You have the legal authority to enter into these Terms
terms.eligibility_3: All information you provide is accurate and truthful
terms.eligibility_4: You will comply with all applicable laws and regulations
terms.services_text: {{companyName}} provides professional tax preparation, immigration services, and business consulting services. Our Services include:
terms.responsibility_1: Providing accurate, complete, and truthful information
terms.responsibility_2: Maintaining the security of your account credentials
terms.responsibility_3: Promptly notifying us of any unauthorized access to your account
terms.responsibility_4: Reviewing all prepared documents before submission
terms.responsibility_5: Complying with all applicable tax laws and regulations
terms.responsibility_6: Paying all fees and charges in a timely manner
terms.irs_compliance_text: You certify that all information provided to us is accurate and truthful. Providing false Social Security Numbers, Taxpayer Identification Numbers, or identity documents may result in:
terms.irs_2: Legal action and reporting to appropriate authorities
terms.irs_warning: You are legally responsible for the accuracy of all information on your tax returns, regardless of who prepares them.
terms.data_protection_text: Your sensitive personal information, including Social Security Number (SSN), driver's license number, and passport number, is protected using industry-standard AES-256-GCM encryption. This means your data is encrypted before being stored in our secure database and can only be decrypted by authorized personnel when necessary for tax preparation services.
terms.data_protection_2: By using our Services, you consent to the secure storage and processing of your sensitive information as described in our Privacy Policy.
terms.electronic_signature_text: By activating your profile and using our Services, you agree to conduct transactions electronically. You acknowledge that your digital acceptance of these Terms and any electronic signatures on tax documents carry the same legal weight as physical signatures under the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act (E-SIGN Act) and applicable state laws.
terms.fees_text: Service fees are disclosed at the time of service selection. You agree to pay all fees associated with the Services you select. Payment is due as specified in your service agreement. We reserve the right to change our fees at any time, but will notify you of any changes before they take effect.
terms.refund_text: Refund policies vary by service type. Please review the specific refund policy for your selected service. Generally, refunds are not available for completed tax preparation services, but may be available for unused services or in cases of service errors. Contact us for specific refund inquiries.
terms.intellectual_text: All content, features, and functionality of our Services, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by {{companyName}} or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.liability_text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, {{companyName}} shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of our Services.
terms.termination_text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account and access to our Services at any time, with or without cause or notice, for any reason, including but not limited to violation of these Terms, fraudulent activity, or non-payment of fees.
terms.changes_text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Terms on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our Services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.
terms.governing_text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Commonwealth of Virginia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.contact_text: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us:

sms.consent_required: You must consent to receive SMS messages
sms.opt_in_error: Failed to opt-in to SMS messages
sms.opt_in_success: Successfully opted in to SMS messages
sms.consent_label: I consent to receive SMS messages
sms.opt_in_subtitle: Receive important updates, reminders, and notifications via text message
sms.opt_in_success_message: You will now receive SMS messages from us. You can opt-out at any time by replying STOP to any message or updating your preferences in account settings.
sms.consent_full: I consent to receive SMS messages from {{companyName}} and have read the SMS Consent Policy
sms.info: Message and data rates may apply. You can opt-out at any time by replying STOP. Supported by major U.S. carriers.
